name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On July 17, a vocational school in Guangzhou had another food safety issue.
A student found a foreign object made of glue in the food in the cafeteria, and suspected it was a condom.
The school replied that it was the eye membrane of a duck, and the relevant samples have been retained. The chef involved has been fired and the kitchen staff have been held accountable.
Afterwards, the local market supervision bureau reported that it had ordered the cafeteria involved to be closed and the samples had been handed over to an authoritative agency for testing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Follow-up: On July 18, Chengdu comiday announced the cancellation of the postponement and will be held as normal.

name: 李老师不是你老师
李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
One netizen is a local community worker who has been working for three months and has no income.
He works for nothing every day. The government does not allocate funds and has been in arrears with wages. Finally, someone familiar with the matter said that it may take half a year to pay, but he, who comes from the countryside, has no idea how to make a living now.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On July 18, a gas explosion occurred in a residential area in Lvyuan District, Changchun City, Jilin Province.
According to the contributor, the cause of the incident was a dispute between a couple, during which they cut off the gas pipeline, causing the explosion.
Currently, the man is dead, the woman is being rescued, and the elderly and children are alive.

"嘬嘬嘬"
Recently, the All-China Women's Federation released a video in which Taiwanese female entrepreneur Ma Aizhen said, "More people from Taiwan should return to the motherland, especially women."
Netizens in the comment section collectively spammed "嘬嘬嘬"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On July 14, the overseas edition of People's Daily published an article titled "China's economy is not about to collapse".
The Chinese version of this article was not published inside the Great Firewall.
The article said that an exaggerated concern is that China lacks new growth momentum and that if the real estate industry stagnates, the overall economy will be dragged down.
Indeed, it is dangerous to indulge in the false prosperity caused by the real estate bubble. Fortunately, the Chinese government has learned the lessons of the transatlantic financial crisis caused by Lehman Brothers and adopted an innovation-driven strategy to pursue high-end, intelligent and green growth.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution 
On July 18, parents of junior high school students in Xi'an went to the municipal government to protest against the returnees from Henan. 
It is reported that there have been immigration issues in the Xi'an high school entrance examination recently. More than 40,000 of the 110,000 candidates are from Henan. Bad black intermediaries specifically register Xi'an household registration and Henan student registration to come to Shaanxi to take the high school entrance examination and college entrance examination, causing the scores of local Shaanxi students to rise by more than 20 points. 
Afterwards, the Xi'an Education Bureau issued a notice to refute the rumor, saying that there were a total of 3,608 "returnees", accounting for 3.5% of the total number of applicants in the city, and the online rumor of "40,000 returnees" was seriously untrue.
